languages.text: "Не тревожься, мирянин. Мы уже привыкли к вопиющей безалаберности, проявляемой стражей на каждом мире, который мы посещаем". {n}Голос вокса, тихий вначале, к концу фразы уже яростно гремит.{/n}
"Do not fret, layperson. We have grown used to outrageous slovenliness among the wardens of every world we visit." {n}Pasqal's vox, quiet at first, is booming with fury by the end of his remark.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Не тревожься, мирянин. Мы уже привыкли к вопиющей безалаберности, проявляемой стражей на каждом мире, который мы посещаем". {n}Голос вокса, тихий вначале, к концу фразы уже яростно гремит.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Do not fret, layman. We have grown used to outrageous slovenliness among the wardens of every world we visit." {n}Pasqal's vox, quiet at first, is booming with fury by the end of his remark.{/n}
"Do not fret, layman. We have grown used to outrageous slovenliness among the wardens of every world we visit." {n}Pasqal's vox, quiet at first, is booming with fury by the end of his remark.{/n}

"Do not fret, layperson. We have grown used to outrageous slovenliness among the wardens of every world we visit." {n}Pasqal's vox, quiet at first, is booming with fury by the end of his remark.{/n}

languages.text: 「心配することはない、俗人。私たちは、訪れるあらゆる世界の守護者たちの非常識なだらしなさには慣れている」{n}パスカルの声は最初は静かだったが、彼の発言の最後には怒りに満ち響いていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not fret, layperson. We have grown used to outrageous slovenliness among the wardens of every world we visit." {n}Pasqal's vox, quiet at first, is booming with fury by the end of his remark.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「心配することはない、俗人。私たちは、訪れるあらゆる世界の守護者たちの非常識なだらしなさには慣れている」{n}パスカルの声は最初は静かだったが、彼の発言の最後には怒りに満ち響いていた。{/n}

languages.text: « N'ayez pas peur, profane. Nous avons exploré de nombreux mondes, et nous sommes habitués à la négligence outrageuse de leurs gardiens. » {n}Le vox de Pasqal, calme tout d'abord, rugit de fureur à la fin de sa phrase.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not fret, layperson. We have grown used to outrageous slovenliness among the wardens of every world we visit." {n}Pasqal's vox, quiet at first, is booming with fury by the end of his remark.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « N'ayez pas peur, profane. Nous avons exploré de nombreux mondes, et nous sommes habitués à la négligence outrageuse de leurs gardiens. » {n}Le vox de Pasqal, calme tout d'abord, rugit de fureur à la fin de sa phrase.{/n}

languages.text: “不用着急，教外人士，我们已经习惯了。无论我们走到什么地方，都只会碰上一无是处的总督，还有他们搞出来的烂摊子。”{n}帕斯卡的声音起初很平静，说到最后却充满了怒意。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not fret, layperson. We have grown used to outrageous slovenliness among the wardens of every world we visit." {n}Pasqal's vox, quiet at first, is booming with fury by the end of his remark.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “不用着急，教外人士，我们已经习惯了。无论我们走到什么地方，都只会碰上一无是处的总督，还有他们搞出来的烂摊子。”{n}帕斯卡的声音起初很平静，说到最后却充满了怒意。{/n}

languages.text: «No se preocupe, laico. Nos hemos acostumbrado a la dejadez de quienes regentan los mundos que visitamos». {n}El voco de Pasqal, tranquilo al principio, retumba de furia al final de su comentario.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not fret, layperson. We have grown used to outrageous slovenliness among the wardens of every world we visit." {n}Pasqal's vox, quiet at first, is booming with fury by the end of his remark.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No se preocupe, laico. Nos hemos acostumbrado a la dejadez de quienes regentan los mundos que visitamos». {n}El voco de Pasqal, tranquilo al principio, retumba de furia al final de su comentario.{/n}

languages.text: "Grämt Euch nicht, Laie. Wir sind das gewohnt Auf sämtlichen Welten, die wir besuchen, sind die Wächter unerhört faul." {n}Pasqals Vox, zunächst noch leise, dröhnt am Ende seines Satzes vor Wut.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not fret, layperson. We have grown used to outrageous slovenliness among the wardens of every world we visit." {n}Pasqal's vox, quiet at first, is booming with fury by the end of his remark.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Grämt Euch nicht, Laie. Wir sind das gewohnt Auf sämtlichen Welten, die wir besuchen, sind die Wächter unerhört faul." {n}Pasqals Vox, zunächst noch leise, dröhnt am Ende seines Satzes vor Wut.{/n}

languages.text: "Avam endişe etmesin. Ziyaret ettiğimiz bütün dünyalarda muhafızların ölçüsüz intizamsızlığına alıştık artık." {n}Pasqal'ın vokstan ilk başta sakin çıkan sesi, sözlerinin sonuna doğru öfkeyle patlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do not fret, layperson. We have grown used to outrageous slovenliness among the wardens of every world we visit." {n}Pasqal's vox, quiet at first, is booming with fury by the end of his remark.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Avamın endişe etmesine lüzum yok. Ziyaret ettiğimiz bütün dünyalarda koruma görevlilerinin muazzam intizamsızlığına alıştık artık." {n}Pasqal'ın ilk başta sesi kısık çıkan voksu, sözlerinin sonuna doğru öfkeyle patlıyor.{/n}
